errors.too-many-requests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

school-card.join-subtitle: Find out if your school was selected for the testing program

complete-profile-card.title: Complete your profile!
complete-profile-card.subtitle: Add a profile photo to complete your profile and start using SpotLive

picker-modal.text: <0>It is forbidden to upload:</0><1>- Violent, offensive, discriminatory content is not permitted and is subject to account suspension.</1><2>- Sexually explicit material.</2><3>- Contents that incite hatred.</3><4> - Photos manipulated or that steal the identity of others.</4>

image-picker.no-gallery-permission: We are sorry, permission to access the gallery is required
image-picker.no-camera-permission: We are sorry, permission to access the camera is required

welcome-screen.title: Welcome on {{APP_NAME}}
welcome-screen.subtitle: Are you looking for new friends or do you simply want to expand your social circle by meeting new people? Then SpotLive is for you! With SpotLive, you will no longer have to desperately search for new relationships online, but you will be able to approach people in real life and expand your circle of friends and acquaintances in an easy and fun way.

signup-screen.title: Hello!
signup-screen.subtitle: Start using spotlive now
signup-screen.verificationCodeText: Enter the verification code sent to <1>{{phoneNumber}}</1>

error.too-many-requests: Too many requests, we have suspended all requests from this device. Please try again later.
error.phone-number-not-valid: The phone number is not valid

ban-screen.title: You have been banned
ban-screen.subtitle: We are sorry, but you have been banned from using SpotLive. If you think this is a mistake, please contact us

wait-for-connection-screen.title: You are offline!
wait-for-connection-screen.subtitle: Please check your internet connection and try again

versioning-screens.version-invalid-subtitle: To continue using the application, you must update it to the latest version

delete-account-screen.label: Enter your name to complete the deletion of your account
delete-account-screen.title: Delete account

warning.title: ATTENTION! Irreversible operation
warning.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete the account? All data and media content associated with it will be deleted. The action is irreversible

success.title: Account deleted
success.subtitle: Your account has been deleted. We are sorry to see you go

welcome.title: How does it work?
welcome.subtitle: Discover people close to you and interact with them
welcome.description1: SpotLive uses various technologies including BLE to make you visible to nearby devices only when we have your consent
welcome.description2: <0>Background use is limited.</0> We recommend keeping the application open for the best experience

ios-position-always.title: Position 'Always'
ios-position-always.subtitle: We are almost there
ios-position-always.description: In the settings, enable the use of location by setting it to ALWAYS

ios-ble.title: Bluetooth
ios-ble.subtitle: We are almost there
ios-ble.description: Allow the use of Bluetooth and connection with nearby devices
ios-ble.description2: SpotLive requires Bluetooth to work and show you the people who are near you!

profile-picture.title: Profile picture
profile-picture.subtitle: We are almost there
profile-picture.description: Add a profile picture to complete your profile and start using SpotLive

radar-screen.see-profile: Tap on username to see profile

set-instagram-screen.title: Instagram account
set-instagram-screen.text: Enter your Instagram username to connect your account

set-state-screen.title: Set your status
set-state-screen.description: The text status will be visible for 24 hours to all people around you

interactions-screen.title: Interactions
interactions-screen.no-interactions-sub: This is where you see your interactions with other users

create-review-screen.title: How do you rate your experience?
create-review-screen.subtitle: Leave a review
create-review-screen.label: Comment

event-join-screen.future-date: You cannot select a future date
event-join-screen.min-age: You must be at least 13 years old

bar-code.permission-justification: Access to the camera is required to read QR codes
bar-code.scan-join: Scan the QR code at the entrance
bar-code.arrived-at-the-event: Inform all your matches that you've arrived at the event

discover.no-matches: You haven't made any matches yet

event-screen.leave-event-sub: Are you sure you want to leave the event?
event-screen.event-not-found-sub: The event you are looking for is not available
event-screen.show-ticket: Show your ticket at the event entrance
event-screen.tutorial-1: Join an event to receive updates, inform your friends, leave reviews, and much more.
event-screen.tutorial-2: For some events, you can preview who's attending.
event-screen.no-friends: None of your friends are currently signed up for this event.
event-screen.first: Be the first to join and lead the crowd!
event-screen.follow-intrested-users: Follow the event to see who's interested
event-screen.unfollow-event-has-request: You can't unfollow the event because you have a pending invitation request.
event-screen.unfollow-event-has-ticket: You can't unfollow the event because you already have a ticket.
event-screen.unfollowed: You're no longer following the event

event-followed-screen.no-events-followed: You haven't subscribed to any events yet
event-followed-screen.find-events-to-follow: Find an event you'd like to attend and subscribe
